titleStmt.title: The speech of the right honourable Edward, Earl of Manchester, Lord Chamberlain of His Majesties houshold delivered at the Guild-Hall, London, on Thursday, being the first day of December, 1664. at a common hall there held : where were also present ... members of the honourable Houses of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Manchester, Edward Montagu, Earl of, 1602-1671.
